banner.title: Bai Jia Kang Fish Oil Softgel

chapter-character: Contains pure fish oil, which can provide sufficient essential fatty acids
600mg active EPA, 400mg DHA and 1000mg total Omega-3 fatty acids per 2 soft gel capsules
chapter-desc: This product is made of fish oil (PronovaPure high-content fish oil ) extracted from Norwegian marine fish as a raw material, and is refined by advanced technology. Bai Jia Kang Fish Oil Softgel contains essential Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids EPA and DHA.

The essential fatty acids required by the human body cannot be synthesized by the human body, so they are often obtained from food. EPA and DHA are essential Omega-3 fatty acids, usually found in fish oil. Bai Jia Kang Fish Oil Softgel contains pure fish oil, which can provide sufficient essential fatty acids.

DHA supports the maintenance of vision and normal brain function. A daily intake of 250mg DHA can achieve beneficial effects. When 250mg of DHA is taken with 250mg EPA it also contributes to normal heart function.
product-instructions: Take two softgel capsules daily. Do not exceed stated dose.
No Artificial Colors, Flavors Or Sweeteners. No Preservatives. No Added Sugar Or Salt. No Starch, No Corn, No Milk, No Lactose, No Soy, No Gluten, No Wheat, No Yeast, No Porcine.

Food supplements are not a substitute for a varied, balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle. If you are pregnant, breastfeeding, using health food or medication under medical supervision, consult a doctor or healthcare professional before using this product. If any adverse reaction occurs during use, please stop using it and consult a doctor. Please keep this product out of the reach of children and store it in a cool, dry place. Do not eat if seal under lid is broken or missing.
